name: Warlord
description: Battlemasters who focus on tactical superiority and battlefield dominance, seeking victory through perfect strategy and disciplined execution regardless of moral considerations.

resource_systems.name: Stamina

mechanics: Stamina points are spent to perform tactical combat maneuvers and command techniques
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming stamina over time
Short rests restore a significant portion of maximum stamina
Depleted stamina causes penalties to tactical abilities and command presence
Can be temporarily boosted through tactical insight in critical situations
Successful execution of tactical maneuvers restores a portion of stamina

resource_systems.name: Combat Focus
resource_systems.description: Mental concentration and battlefield awareness that enhances combat effectiveness
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds during combat, decreases during periods of inaction
mechanics: Increases by 20 when landing critical hits or successfully executing tactical maneuvers
Increases by 15 per 10 seconds in active combat

resource_systems.name: Command Authority

Increases by 20 when demonstrating tactical superiority over enemies
Decreases by 15 when tactical plans fail despite proper execution
Decreases by 20 when outmaneuvered by enemy tacticians
Can be spent to issue powerful command abilities that coordinate allies
Higher Command Authority increases the effectiveness of tactical commands

resource_systems.name: Strategic Dominance

Decreases by 15 when strategic plans are countered or disrupted
Decreases by 10 when forced to abandon strategic objectives
Can be spent to execute perfect tactical maneuvers or gain battlefield insights

lore: Warlords represent the most pragmatic path a Battlemaster can take, having dedicated their martial prowess and leadership abilities to achieving victory through perfect strategy and tactical superiority. These master tacticians have transcended ordinary combat leadership to become unparalleled battlefield commanders, capable of turning even the most challenging military situation to their advantage through disciplined execution and strategic brilliance. The path to becoming a Warlord requires not only exceptional combat skills and tactical acumen but also a pragmatic mindset that prioritizes results over ideological considerations. Those who succeed find themselves capable of analyzing and controlling battlefield dynamics with unprecedented clarity, their tactical directives transforming even average soldiers into devastatingly effective fighting forces. Warlords typically serve as high-ranking military commanders, leaders of elite mercenary companies, or independent military advisors whose services are sought by those facing complex strategic challenges. Many establish their own military organizations built around their personal tactical doctrines, training officers and soldiers in their methodical approach to warfare. Some even become legendary strategists whose tactical innovations change the very nature of military conflict in their era. Their combination of personal combat prowess, tactical genius, and command presence makes them formidable opponents in any conflict, where their ability to coordinate allied forces and counter enemy strategies can overcome seemingly insurmountable odds. Though they may lack the inspirational presence of Champions or the intimidating dominance of Conquerors, the tactical brilliance and strategic adaptability of Warlords make them perhaps the most consistently effective battlefield commanders when victory through superior strategy is the primary objective.
